title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra vs Google Pixel 6 Pro: Do-it-all hardware takes on ingenious whimsical software
content:
The SamsungÂ Galaxy S22 Ultra has no shortage of Android flagship challengers in many parts of the world, including most notably Asia. But in North America, which is one of Samsung’s top two markets (the other being its home country), it only has to worry about two phones. We already pitted the Galaxy S22 Ultra versus

The post Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra vs Google Pixel 6 Pro: Do-it-all hardware takes on ingenious whimsical software appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy S22 Ultra is the phone with the best hardware right now, but Google's Pixel 6 Pro proves brilliant software can make a difference.
